<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.setValueDescription</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>setValueDescription</name><script><![CDATA[var setValueDescription= Class.create();
// Extend the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
setValueDescription.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor,{
	// Define the set value of description function.  
	// Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
	// Return the email address for the requested record
	setDescription: function() {
var currentTime = new Date();
 currentTime = formatDate(new Date(), g_user_date_time_format);  
		return currentTime ;
	},
	type: 'setValueDescription'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-01 04:08:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b6b61ac07395010221af6fd7c1ed0a9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setValueDescription</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7b6b61ac07395010221af6fd7c1ed0a9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-01 04:11:42</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
